text: tan tay tantaiyarukku nanmai ceyyumpatiyaka nam manitanukku vasiyyattu ceytirukkirom; eninum, (manitane!) Unakku arivu illata onrai enakku inaiyakkumpati avviruvarum unnai varpuruttinal, ni avviruvarukkum kilpatiya ventam; ennitame unkal anaivarin milutalum irukkiratu ninkal ceytu kontiruntavai parri appotu nan unkalukku arivippen
